oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Substituent directed distal photoisomerisation of > C=C < in indolic dienyl chromophores
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
HOTA, PK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cis-trans isomerization
photochemistry
photophysics
vision
rhodopsin
polyenes
model
indolic ethenes
indolic ethenoates
photoisomerisation
substituent effect
solvent effect
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Methyl-3-methyl-5-(3-N-benzenesulphonylindole)-2E,4E-pentadienoate and methyl-3-methyl-5-(3-N-H indole)-2E,4E-pentadienoate are synthesized and their photoisomerisation behaviour in 1.4-dioxane and methanol are examined. The photoisomerisation of these compounds is highly dependent upon the substituent present at the indolic nitrogen atom.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 45(11), 2469-2473
